Articles.Content: This time marks the first video edition of storytime with SkyHook! Our mission for the day spawns from another one I was performing: routine drilling on the Mun. I landed in a crater only to spot an arch, which I quickly diverted to go see. I regretted it however, as I crashed! T-T Luckily I survived. I had to undertake a mission to retrieve my comrade! Watch the video to find out what happens next.
